application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The Ash trees are situated within the rear garden of 27 and 26, they alongside other trees form a
green feature when entering the borough from Harrow along Cuckoo Hill. As a result the have a
moderate amenity value and set the scene for the arboricultural character of Hillingdon as people
No arboricultural reasons have been provided as to why the two Ash trees require any tree work.
The removal of deadwood, dangerous / hanging branches and ivy:  This does not require the formal consent of the Council.
description: To carry out tree surgery - to reduce height by 3m & lateral spread by 2.5m to One Ash (T1 on map), and cut back overhanging branches to One Ash (T2 on map) both in W1 within TPO 555.
